alert.note: Alert for Pecos (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 10 at 9:52PM CDT until October 11 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall from earlier this evening. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Texas, including the following county, Pecos. * WHEN...Until 645 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding reported 8 miles north of Fort Stockton and 10 miles south of Fort Stockton on US Hwy 285. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 952 PM CDT, Emergency management reported flooding from earlier storms. Additional rainfall possible tonight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fort Stockton and Fort Stockton-Pecos County Airport. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
